page.title: 18YOUTH LEISURE LITTLE MILL
page.content: There is a children's playground and recreation field next to the village hall.A children's club for under 12's meets once weekly in the hall,also a mother and toddlers group.Occasionally a disco is held for young teenagers. A few boys play cricket with the men's team and some girls attend ladies keep fit.The boy's football team disbanded because there was no home pitch. Children have to be transported to Pontypool,Usk or Goytre by parents for organisations and activities such as Scouts/Cubs, Guides/Brownies, Air Training Corps.,Army Cadets, swimming, ballet,Kung_Fu,gymnastics,tennis,etc. The Village Hall Committee are now hoping to build on a room for youngsters to use for sporting activities etc.but it has yet to be decided if this is economically viable.
